name: Vertigo Tabs
author: Erwan Ameil
description:
Vertical tab bar for Firefox 57+
Goal of this extension:

  - respect the user's system theme (colors, font sizes)
  - should just work => sane defaults. If possible, no configuration
    should be necessary.

WebExtensions cannot automatically hide the horizontal tab bar for now.
The current workaround is to add `#TabsToolbar {visibility: collapse;}` (without quotes) to the `[your_ffox_profile_dir]/chrome/userChrome.css` file (create it and the `chrome` folder if necessary).
Ctrl+Y is the shortcut to open/close the sidebar from the keyboard. This allows you to hide it when going fullscreen for exampe (not necessary for fullscreen from videos/youtube, the sidebar already isn't shown).
